channel.title: fzf on SpareSlant Technical Blog
channel.description: Recent content in fzf on SpareSlant Technical Blog

item.title: Vim Tips and Tricks
item.description: motion CTRL-e => move screen down with moving cursor. CTRL-y => reverse * => search whole word under the cursor in file. # => search backwards H M L => (50% screen scroll) High, Medium, Low cusror postion in current viewport of screen CTRL-d => 25% screen scroll along with cursor. CTRL-u => reverse CTRL-f => full screen scroll along with cursor. CTRL-b => reverse g_ => move cursor to the end of line till first non-blank character.
